entityType.description: The type of the menu component described by this JSON object

id.description: The unique identifier for the menu group

idString.description: This field is for Toast internal use only

guid.description: The unique identifier for the menu group, assigned by the Toast POS

name.description: A descriptive identifier for the menu group

description.description: A written description of the menu group

imageLink.description: A URL to an image located on Amazon S3

orderableOnline.description: Indicates whether the menu group is available for online ordering

visibility.description: Indicates where the menu group is displayed and who can see it

images.description: A JSON array of image objects

date.description: Date folder name from SFTP path

menu_guid.description: Unique identifier for the parent menu
